description:
In the fourth installment of the Jerk Off series, I decided to try something a little different.
The guys in the previous contests were good sports, but the one complaint they always had was that they wished a girl could be involved in some way... you know, as a source of "inspiration."
So, I enlisted the help of a beautiful girl named Jenny to act as a cheerleader.
The participants were David, Oliver, Marc, and Kevin, whom we saw in "Auditions 5". The guys took an instant liking to Jenny and the minute her clothes were off they all had smiles on their faces.
I have to admit that having a girl there for them, posing and playing with herself just off camera, really made a difference. The guys were very animated and really put on a good show. Their interaction with her was really fun to watch!
title: Jerk Off Contest 4
